website_summaries.verdict: A well-rounded guide that covers everyday scenarios, extreme wilderness survival, and just about everything in between.
pros: This book covers a wide range of topics, from computer viruses to preventing scurvy to escaping a burning building
Information is clear and well organized with high-quality photos
No need to read book from cover to cover
simply find the section that pertains to your situation
Effective at relaying the seriousness of being unprepared should danger strike

customer_reviews.title: Don't be put off by the detailed manner of this guide...
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review mostly to address what some other reviewers have said about the author's inclusion of "obvious and unnecessary" detail...like keep your clothes dry in cold weather...things like that. I've worked as a psychologist with military folks and cops in a prison setting and their attention to detail is crucial when dealing with difficult scenarios. They drill, drill drill to be prepared for whatever might come up (especially the crisis management teams) and this includes even obvious, common sense details. The author wants to make sure that you don't overlook anything in the survival game. This is an excellent guide with tons of useful information. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: snackish

customer_reviews.title: Good but misinformed/lacking
customer_reviews.text: Good basics book, though you can tell both it's age and the country it was intended for. I completely disagree with the self defence section, not only for it's view in firearms but it's lack of understanding for weapons and material arts "techniques". I have a background in profesional firearms training as well as bjj/mma. Though I'll admit my survival skills are lacking, hence why I picked up this book with the current "pandemic".
customer_reviews.author: GearHead

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with shelter building section
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with shelter building section. Since this is most important if stranded in bad weather, I thought this would be a major part of the book. The author did spend a small amount of time on shelter, but most of it on building in the polar region. This is a region which most of us never see, therefore the author should have spent the majority of shelter building on the temperate zone, where the majority of people in world live. I feel most people could learn more about survival by watching youtube videos than reading this book.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: i'm not gonna make it.
customer_reviews.text: I was inspired to get a book on survival because of Covid and a fiction book I'm reading about a disease that wipes our 99 percent of the population... after flipping through this guide it is painfully clear that I am not gonna make it. Maybe I just need a much more descriptive guide.... the section on skinning animals really wasn't clear enough for me - I'm not even good at getting all the meat off of a rotisserie chicken, and I hate doing it. I'm also pretty sure i'd rather die than use animal eyeballs as a water source (to be fair, that wasn't the first source suggested by the author!)
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Limited use book
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like the book. It was just to topical, scattered and quite frankly, useless for most people interested in survival. It is written in a manner where the content only skims over basic circumstances of survival in nearly every location in the world. The book presents a subject, lists a quick topical blurb and then moves on. No true learning takes place. The author paints with broad brush strokes at times and doesn't teach key practical skills - case in point, the book shows types of shelters/pictures, but not how to build one. Really? Wouldn't that be something important to know?
customer_reviews.author: Primeshopfam

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.text: Granted. I have not read the whole thing, yet. But the section I was VERY interested in and is the reason I bought it is junk. The section on foraging plants for food was about as vague as...well I can't find an analogy. Every YouTuber and his cousin praise this book like it the be-all, end-all. Well, not for me. 14 bucks in the toilet. That's pretty expensive toiliewipe.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: According to the SAS Survival Handbook...
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever had a drill instructor pushing you and teaching you about survival, read this book. If you've never had a drill instructor in your face and you're a bit of a softy, you too need to read this book. I'm not kidding. If you grew up in my generation and can remember the phrase "According to the Junior Woodchucks' Guide Book" this is that, but for adults. Don't be caught with your pants down when you need to count on yourself the most, this book can help prepare you for whatever you need to face. Read it, store the knowledge, prepare for the worst and hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: AnTnY

customer_reviews.title: I bought two copies
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert, but I want to be. I bought a copy of this book to learn from, and very soon after I bought a second copy to keep in my go bag. If society goes to shit and I have to get out, I want a copy of this book with me. But I still want a copy at home to read and study. I already built the survival tin he suggests early in the book. I keep that with me at all times. If shit hits the fan, I will have fishing line and hooks, stuff to make fire, and a lot of other small emergency gear. And I'm glad I learned those things from this book.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cross

customer_reviews.title: You can find better books out there. Keep searching.
customer_reviews.text: Too much info, too little detail, covering too many topics. Would much rather read a book that had more detail on more likely scenarios. All the extreme points in the book apply to what??? Less than 1% of people.
customer_reviews.author: Trojansky

customer_reviews.title: Wow, almost 700 pages
customer_reviews.text: This book has tons of information. including survival scenarios and hacks. Considering how much I paid for this book it is quite a bargain. If you enjoying educating yourself on topics of bushcraft and survival than I would definably consider adding this book to your collection.
customer_reviews.author: VeryFrustratedDadOnXmas

customer_reviews.title: Tons of info.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first survival book as I am just now getting into prepping and survival craft. Wish I would have started sooner but at least i'm doing it. With that being said, I have no other survival books to compare this too. I can say that this book, in my opinion, is pretty awesome. TONS of information with good detail on how to do things and pictures too. It's a little overwhelming and I would have liked it to be a little more specific on things to learn first or maybe like a must know section. but overall, great book!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping and in good quality. This book features a lot survival tips like edible and poisonous plants, self defense, navigating your terrain, etc. Would recommend for those who would like to study survival.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia N

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Book for Preppers and Outdoors-People
customer_reviews.text: A classic survival book in prepper circles. Great to keep around the house, but a little hefty for a go-bag. Pay attention to the product dimensions; this is not a pocketbook! I put it in my bag anyway because it covers a tremendous amount of material. If you don't know British terminology for things like "beta lights" and "surgical spirit" then you should keep the internet handy when reading. Just get it and read it; you'll learn tons of things that you never knew you need to know. It also came a few days sooner than the rest of my order, so bonus points for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This an absolutely amazing and comprehensive survival guide with detailed sections for just about any situation you could ever find yourself in. It has color pictures and comprehensive food/tracks/animal guides. Highly recommend 👉IF👈 you have the space for it in you bag, because it is about the size and weight of a dictionary. Note: it is not small, it's about the size of a dictionary.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Carefull of this publisher/auther
customer_reviews.text: Very informative book, BUT PLEASE DONT BUY THE IPAD APP, you will one day open the app expecting to have the info there and the app will tell you COMMINGSOON so please be carefull, I got the app, bought the 2 modules( after buying the book from amazon) and thought that I am sorted, and after wanting to read on the app now,,all the info is gone and COMMING SOON , not happy
customer_reviews.author: Bertie R

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE should have at least 1 survival book like this. Hope we don't need to use this info
customer_reviews.text: good book filled with many great tips on surviving. Most americans are pampered & think nothing bad can happen. Now with coronavirus I hope many are thinking differently.
customer_reviews.author: nancy of Moline

customer_reviews.title: Excellent book, arrived in poor condition
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 star review but the book was shipped with another one in a plastic bag taped instead of a box. It was also shipped internationally which included import fees etc so this package should have been shipped in a box like your Canadian counterpart does. Outside of that- I absolutely love the book! I'm not quite finished it yet but I've read multiple books like it and this one is very well done with some information you don't get from others in the same genre/ category. 5 star if it was shipped properly.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole

customer_reviews.title: A must-read if you care about this kind of preparedness
customer_reviews.text: I really liked reading this book/guide and was very nice to get a different countries perspective regarding the unexpected and survival recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: G. Miller

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t wait to get this book and already dove into it. A treasure trove of useful and possibly life saving information in this book.
customer_reviews.author: REGULATOR

customer_reviews.title: If God forbid something went wrong
customer_reviews.text: There is so much information in here it is mind boggling. If God forbid something went wrong, I would hope I could hold up someplace and have this with me. If your a avid outdoorsman hiker, hunter, etc..This would also be a good read and companion. I only wish the cover was stronger or hard cover. The cover is well made as is, but if the poop hits the fan, I would want to be able to stand up for some abuse that would go along elements that would be out there.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: The book is really nice quality. Although it's paperback, the paper itself is really good quality. The print is outstanding and the pages are (waterproof?) - not sure. Still a good book. The contents are also interesting and rwally nice to read. Recommend it for anyone, who is looking forward to expand their knowledge in survival.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru Cebotar

customer_reviews.title: The best I have ever read
customer_reviews.text: This is the most thorough book I have ever read n Survival, It has lots of pics in it to help you be able to see the plants, animals and other things so you will be able to find them a lot faster, This book covers almost any emergency situation and also has info on medical. knots and how to do them and traps , hunting, cooking your kills and so much more. I am recommending this to everyone I know because it just could save your life in unexpected situations. Great to pack in your bug out bags.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Young

customer_reviews.title: Wow , a huge, and great, book
customer_reviews.text: Six hundred and some odd pages , WOW this book is huge and heavy to carry. This book was written by a man who was in the SAS for 26 years and other survival specialist groups too. Incidentally SAS is the British Special Air Services group. Like our Green Beret in some ways , like Ranger's in other ways. But in all ways great survivalists . I think it's written in a concise way that most people will understand. Even has replications of plants you can eat and those you shouldn't eat. But this is a book you should study and then carry it with you as you will never remember all the information in it .
customer_reviews.author: Mikey B.

customer_reviews.title: I like the book
customer_reviews.text: Got it in the mail quickly. The skills seem to cater to more basic levels of training, but hey, lets be honest: if you’re getting your “skills” from a leisure read you’re probably not a military special forces person in the first place. I like the book, and I’ll build a rudimentary game trap, purify some water, learn my geographical location and take on anyone who says otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I found this a bit harder to follow than I'd have like. Using the references to plants in a region was not as well written as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: William Johnston

customer_reviews.title: easy as in complete step by step instructions for hunting ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something a bit different. I was expecting in depth colored pictures of edible and poisonous plants, diagrams, easy as in complete step by step instructions for hunting and preparing game etc. It does have a lot of useful information just not in the format or depth as I would prefer. Otherwise I still recommend it as it can be of great use in wilderness survival.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Great info, many typos
customer_reviews.text: Lot's of interesting info in this book, and it covers many situations and scenarios. The one major downside is that there are many common typos in the writing, which is distracting and made me question the validity of the content therein. I chalked it up to just this edition (3rd Edition), so I expect all of these errors have been fixed in later editions.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good book for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Good read. The author covers a lot of topics and doesn’t miss much. Gives a good perspective on survival for a beginner or someone curious about the topic. The only drawback is that it is not very specific to a particular location and covers lightly on all areas of the world. If you want more specific information that relates to where you live, I would find a different book.
customer_reviews.author: AugustCat11

customer_reviews.title: Anti gun author
customer_reviews.text: I liked it up until I realized the author is anti gun and anti 2nd amendment. A survival book that doesn’t think guns are good for survival? I’ll pass. Fire wood for now. I’ll stick to David Canterbury.
customer_reviews.author: Source Consciousness

customer_reviews.title: Good information
customer_reviews.text: delivered quickly. Information in this book is valuable. The information here can save your life or the life of others. Worth the read. Thank the author to share this knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: david colon

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed!
customer_reviews.text: This book is awesome and exactly what I was looking for. It's definitely not a take along book though it's very thick and heavy but it's great for the house and I've been reading it front to back like a real book. It's full of useful information for many different scenarios and locations with color pictures and explenations. Haven't gotten to the new urban survival chapter yet but I'm site is great. Overall great book for any prepper or camper to have and just everyone to educate themselves on what could save their lives when shtf.
customer_reviews.author: RebelR66

customer_reviews.title: Great info on anything for the outdoor
customer_reviews.text: I'm love this book its full of helpful information. Info that i can easily understand and pass down to love ones , this will help me get outdoors more often. Lol .
customer_reviews.author: Martin Perez JR

customer_reviews.title: One of the best and most comprehensive survival guides around
customer_reviews.text: One of the best and most comprehensive survival guides around. This book has so much information that you really need to take your time while reading it to ensure that everything sinks in. I'd recommend reading it once through, slowly, then read it a second time while flagging pages and highlighting information that may be more important to you. Then throw it in your bug out bag as a go to reference when you may need it most. It is not a small or light book, but the weight is worth it to me. You can also make copies of the pages you find most useful to save on weight. Get this book and you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Lofty is a great survival teacher
customer_reviews.text: Book was mint when i receive it. Arrived very fast. My second "Lofty" SAS survival book. This man really knows his stuff. Any type of survival situation you can think of is covered in his material. Everything is explained in detail and anyone could learn and put to use anything covered in this book. You never know when something youve read and learned from this could be put to use. A great read and I recommend actually taking this book into the wilderness with you and a friend ann some basic tools and trying some of the things taught. You'd be surprised what you can do and how easy it is.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: I'm SO happy this book shows you how to build a bow
customer_reviews.text: I have not finished looking through this completely but so far I am enjoying it very much. It has everything I imagined a survival book would so I am content. I decided I wanted a survival handbook after I started watching Arrow on CW. He was stranded on an island... it could happen to anyone. I'm SO happy this book shows you how to build a bow! It also talks about plants, food, shelter.. it covers all the bases. If you're looking for a great survival book, this is a great one, with pictures and diagrams.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Nahley

customer_reviews.title: Very educational
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a copy for my grandson, decided I like the updates and gave him my old copy and kept this one for myself. Everyone should have a copy of this book and should keep it with you whenever you leave town. I recommend keeping a second copy in your office as well.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Covers real world scenarios not Zombie appocolypse or SHTF
customer_reviews.text: Well written book covers survival in any climate or local. Even covers urban survival in case of pandemic or civil unrest.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: It's the end of the world as we know it....and I feel fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Dad for Christmas awhile ago and never left a review. So here goes This book was great! My dad loved it and ended up sitting there reading Christmas morning. It's very detailed and has ALOT of great info whether you're prepping for the apocalypse or maybe just going camping, either way it has information for everything!
customer_reviews.author: karista melsheimer

customer_reviews.title: Filled with info
customer_reviews.text: I haven't got a chance to sit down and read the book fully, but it appears to be filled with a bunch of useful topics and nice illustrations, unfortunately the book was a little bent up at the corner, not a really big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this to every single person to read and learn from.
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely loving this guide so far. A lot of useful stuff that I would never have learned if I didn't buy the book. I'm not a huge outdoors guy, was raised in a family that never even went hiking let alone camping, hunting, surviving etc. I know I will never be a master of survival but this book without a doubt is a great item to read and keep around just in case you ever have to bug-out and live off the land.
customer_reviews.author: An Honest CustomerTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: Not pocket sized
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the product details much closer for measurements. This is not a pocket sized book. I had previously purchased a small pocket sized version and thought I was reordering the same - they look the same in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mbbrown

customer_reviews.title: A ABSOLUTE MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GREAT ADDITION TO ANY BAG ALWAYS GREAT TO HAVE GOOD INFO ONE OF THE BEST TOP 3 SURVIVAL GUIDES ON THE PLANET
customer_reviews.author: Joshua U.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by a survival nerd
customer_reviews.text: Ever since boyscouts I've been into wilderness survival. This book really enhances that aspect of my life. You'll learn how to build a proper shelter using only nature. You'll learn how to purify water, and how to trap or snare animals. You'll learn how to build weapons and navigate using the world. If anything, you have some good party tricks to show people.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Keep the book handy and do not hide in a box in the closet.
customer_reviews.text: This book has many nice features and common sense knowledge but it covers stuff that you can not remember like what kind of mushrooms are edible and which are not along with other fruits, vegetables, berries, roots, etc. WSHF this book may save your life. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tibor Sandor

customer_reviews.title: among the best on earth
customer_reviews.text: This book should be the standard by which all other survival books be compared with. If you're unable to survive after learning and practicing the information given here, then it just wasn't meant to be. As a military veteran, I've learned procedures here which I didn't know before and believe me, U.S. military survival courses are extensive and in my opinion, among the best on earth. So, get this book, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: ECA

customer_reviews.title: Very Thorough Survival Guide
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for the outdoorsman or survivalist in your family. Covers survival in every type of environment, including knots, foraging, and first aid. Easy to read and full of carefully-detailed illustrations.
customer_reviews.author: G.G.

customer_reviews.title: All encompassing book that will serve as an excellent primer on survival tactics
customer_reviews.text: Very thorough read. Plenty of material to review and learn. It's apparent that this writer has some on-hand experiences which mirror the training received from the CERT program. Obviously, this is geared for just about any eventuality...from urban to wilderness. It is an all-encompassing approach to survival. I especially appreciated the urban tactics and common sense for staying safe in man-made and natural catastrophes.
customer_reviews.author: elgreco

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT BOOK!
customer_reviews.text: I sure wish I had this back when I was in the boy scouts. It is a must have for preppors and survivalists alike.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff LeMond

customer_reviews.title: Covers most all the basics! Practice what you learn!
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly enjoying this book! It is heavy at just under two pounds so if you want to take this along in your backpack I would recommend the compact version! Loads and loads of information for the novice as well as the experienced person! Looking forward to spending more time with this invaluable tool !
customer_reviews.author: William Gosnell

customer_reviews.title: Happy in Hebron
customer_reviews.text: I hope to never have to use this and I hope the info in it's is trustworthy if I ever do.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Hommon

customer_reviews.title: great read!!
customer_reviews.text: Really great read, Alot I already knew in this book as I was exmilitary and was trained in alot of this.
customer_reviews.author: Harley13

customer_reviews.title: Too much knowledge!
customer_reviews.text: Great book. Has a ridiculous about if information. Definitely something I want with me in a pinch. I would actually want less content in this book as it is pretty thick. Makes it bulky in a back pack.
customer_reviews.author: SteveB

customer_reviews.title: Buy this book NOW!
customer_reviews.text: So complete the first past through almost causes anxiety at all the situations you could find yourself in! Fortunately, the book has all of the answers you will need to survive just about any situation. I plan to by a copy each for my kids (who are in college.) Don't waste time...get this book! The author taught survival skills to the Royal SAS (equivalent to the US' Navy Seals) for 26 years. Just an amazing book! I hope I never have to use it, except for camping tips. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: David Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Very dry - very happy
customer_reviews.text: Had this for my birthday, loved it. Took it camping. We had a storm and my tent got flooded....sad panda..... so I bought it again. Really happy with the quality, much drier than my previous copy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott In Arizona

customer_reviews.title: A great narrative on what it takes to survive when the situation goes bad.
customer_reviews.text: Take your survival advice from a fellow who has lived it. Have known a few of these SAS operatives and they are as smart and tough as they come. A great narrative on what it takes to survive when the situation goes bad. A word to the wise is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: lizzardman

customer_reviews.title: This book could save your life!
customer_reviews.text: There's some great information in this book! I'm not a prepper, mountain man, or anything like that. I just wanted it for general information because you never know! A person could find themselves in a situation where information in this book would be helpful, possibly even save their life or the life of a loved one.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: The Survival Bible for everyday
customer_reviews.text: This is the Bible of survival, a must have for anyone who is serious about disaster survival as well as common knowledge everyone should educate themselves on, the information within this book is more valuable than the cost itself. No matter if your in a disaster situation, camping out, or common everyday journeys, this book provides information from fishing, hunting, survival, food, plants, insects and spiders, snakes, animal tracks, trapping, sheltering, personal protection, first aid, and just plain common sense issues we encounter everyday, this book has lots of info that has become forgotten over the years,.... it could literally save you life.
customer_reviews.author: NOAA 411

customer_reviews.title: Very useful info - organized so you can go to exactly what you need to know at the moment.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful info - organized so you can go to exactly what you need to know at the moment. Also updated with recently relevant info such as urban and terrorism survival.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K Jez

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Has some useful info. But very very basic. Only buy if you have no experience at all
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I can hardly wait to have the time to sit down and really enjoy this book and learn all the knowledge that they ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had time to read a couple of pages of the Urban chapter, but also couldn't resist taking a peak at the camping section. I can hardly wait to have the time to sit down and really enjoy this book and learn all the knowledge that they are sharing with us. I told my sorority sisters (we're in our 70's now) about the book at lunch today, and they want me to give a little program on what I'm learning when we get together for lunch every month. Everyone should have this book in their home library.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Good bent book
customer_reviews.text: Great book, I just wished the cover was not creased at the corners strait from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: i would easily recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I got this book for its outdoor survival techniques, and ways to conserve things in an emergency. A must have if you're a parent especially. First aid section and plant identification was very well explained, illustrated, and probably the most important thing in that book overall. Very insightful, i would easily recommend this to anyone..
customer_reviews.author: VtCollection

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Survival Book
customer_reviews.text: If you were to just get one survival book this would be it. Chuck it in your bug-out bag, read it before you take your kids camping, whatever. If you just want one catch-all read, get this one!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: First choice of many.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well put together book. I agree with others that this is the essential reference guide to keep with you.
customer_reviews.author: William Kelley

customer_reviews.title: its alright. i thought it was a mini book its hella big
customer_reviews.text: wasnt that happy to hard to understand not that many pictures
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: I like the book
customer_reviews.text: I like the book. There is almost too much information, but for a book that was written to give people info on how to survive in any situation and in any climate, it is worth it. This is a great reference book and I will certainly carry it when I am traveling as a "just in case something happens" book and I get stranded somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and informational
customer_reviews.text: It's a book you can read and reference but good luck trying to remember everything. It's a fun read but it's better if you're able to go out and practice what the book advises you to do not just read and remember what to do
customer_reviews.author: Redgrave

customer_reviews.title: SUPER.
customer_reviews.text: A bigger and thicker book than the previous version. Some might think a little too big for BOB. Not me; it is a wealth of information. Even has colored pictures on edible plants, poisonous snakes and others. If I need to use BOB in an emergency; an extra pound with extra reading will be useful and kill some time in the bush. P.S. It contains information for different climates around the globe.
customer_reviews.author: J-Man-Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Nice book!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot wait to read. It came in mint condition. Not a page bent!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: I haven't found a better book in the topics covered
customer_reviews.text: If the topics in this are of interest to you, you cannot get a single book that is better. Many other resources will dive into more detail about a single aspect. Nothing I have found covers this variety as thoroughly in a single volume.
customer_reviews.author: M. Blair

customer_reviews.title: this one will get you through and do a good job of it
customer_reviews.text: So many of this type book out there, but this one stands the test of time. If space is at a premium and you just can have one book, this is the one. Others may offer more detail, but if survival is the aim, this one will get you through and do a good job of it.
customer_reviews.author: MX5000

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome Guide!!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome!! This book is a little heavier than the 1st edition. So take note of pack weight. But it's more than worth the price! It also coincides with the modern television survival shows; and with the added Urban and Disaster chapters... you can't get much better a book. This book really can save your life/lives.
customer_reviews.author: M.S. Heiser

customer_reviews.title: WIDE spectrum of information
customer_reviews.text: Any day you learn something new, is a good day. This was a couple of great days. Definitely worth the read for beginners or "masters".
customer_reviews.author: Kawiloje

customer_reviews.title: So when it says handbook...
customer_reviews.text: Take out “handbook” from the title and you’d have a great reference book. Not very convenient for a pack.
customer_reviews.author: B Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Get this book!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this book for quite sometime now. It has everything you could possibly need. It's very informative. I would recommend this to anybody. This is a must-have if you truly want to be informed on basic survival skills that you will need to stay alive in any situation.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: High quality survival Book
customer_reviews.text: Easy read how to survival Book offers survival info fro. Woodsy survival to uban survival livingand much more. I'm very please with this how to book.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Burke

customer_reviews.title: Good Read
customer_reviews.text: This is not the small pocket size version. There are many versions of this book online so it is easy to get confused. That said, book is really interesting to read and it looks pretty cool on my bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: Bearded Tree

customer_reviews.title: Very good information to know.
customer_reviews.text: I am liking it so far. Some things I already knew, but a lot I didn't know. It's a great reference book to have.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for on the go and teaching basics of survival. Very compact. Great contents. Please look at this before a wilderness journey ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N. Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you need this book!
customer_reviews.text: Great book! Filled with survival knowledge. We should all know this stuff or at least have a copy of this book in the house or in your survival emergency pack. My son and I both have read it and both have our own copies. I don't Great book! Full of information we should all know. My son and I both have a copy and are forever going back and reading sections again and again. There is so much information we just can't retain it all! A must for all survival emergency packs.
customer_reviews.author: NelJB

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it! I skimmed through it when I received it and I thought it was incredibly informative. Would definitely purchance more books like this for him
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend for people who know nothing about survival
customer_reviews.text: Skimmed through. Definitely shares alot more than I know an will be handy if needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very informative and thorough great book!
customer_reviews.text: Very informative and seems to be thorough. It went into my bugout bag. While I hope I never have to use it, if I ever need to know how to forage, I’ll be able to identify everything and do absolutely everything!
customer_reviews.author: cd9963

customer_reviews.title: but so far I think it is well written and has plenty useful information. Some of the other similar books I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not read this book completely, but so far I think it is well written and has plenty useful information. Some of the other similar books I have read were hit and miss on the info and didn't really have real life situations in mind.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wealth of knowledge, with out it tools are just toys.
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge help in feeling like i'm prepared for whatever may come, be it the zombie apocalypse, or just an extended weekend of camping. This is everything I'd have wanted my hunter, gatherer, survivalist grandfather to have passed down to me from his life of expertise, had he existed as such.
customer_reviews.author: Xmas

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The amount of copies sold speaks for itself. I've wanted this book for years dont know why I waited so long to get it. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Wagner

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't read all of it yet but it is pretty comprehensive. It has a limited section of edible and poisons plants with full color pics to identify
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome book!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome book!! Only a few chapters in but it's fantastic!! A ton of information! I realize now why this is the "survival bible"!! I just wish they made it in the smaller version like the 2nd edition, I would like a compact copy to put in my backpack !
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: the only book you need to stay alive when the s hits the fan!!!!
customer_reviews.author: matthew king

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves survival books.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is a big fan of the outdoors, and goes to a wilderness camp every summer. Who better to learn survival skills from?
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Arrived mangled
customer_reviews.text: My son has really been wanting this book. Unfortunately it arrived as if it was NOT new, mangled badly. I would have returned it but this was one of his Christmas wishes.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M

customer_reviews.title: One of the best survival books out there
customer_reviews.text: Great book with lots of valuable information. I like the fact it covers several different climates and what to focus on in each area. I find myself wanting more information in some areas which I think is a good thing. This book expands your train of thought.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Warga

customer_reviews.title: Living in a disaster
customer_reviews.text: If your not addicted to a smart phone, pick this up and explore the contents. Things I never thought of are covered, and would be a good read before and during a SHTF scenario.
customer_reviews.author: David C Brown

customer_reviews.title: Informative
customer_reviews.text: Thumb through the book when it came in. It’s a lot thicker than I thought (that’s what she said). Covers all kinds of topics and suggests little things you may not think about.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Sonnier

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Any Household
customer_reviews.text: An excellent book full of information anyone would find useful.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: This Handbook just keeps getting better.
customer_reviews.text: I recently gave my Second Edition of this book to a friend and bought the Third Edition. This book is even more packed with great survival situation advice and how-to guides.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Super book
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should own this book. Will make for great gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get laid, book gives secrets to how
customer_reviews.text: After reading this book, my testosterone levels spiked, i grew a beard overnight and started to sleep with my eyes open. This book will get you a girlfriend and so much attention by females. Beware read carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: This is an absolutely amazing book. I have never seen a comparable collection ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely amazing book. I have never seen a comparable collection of survival information that even comes close to what this book provides. I strongly recommend this book to anyone who has an interest in survival training or who may ever be faced with a situation where they may need to cope with any kind of emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: but there is some very good information in this book
customer_reviews.text: I am still reading it, but there is some very good information in this book. Many things the common guy would not think of. While I don't relish the idea of having to live in the outdoors full time, I would want this book in my bag if I was faced with that situation.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Solomon

product_meta.title: SAS Survival Handbook, Third Edition: The Ultimate Guide to Surviving Anywhere
